sourcesContent:
function Sidebar({ notes, onAddNote, onDeleteNote }){ return

Divyansh's Notes

{notes.map((note)=>(
{note.title}

{note.body && note.body.substr(0,100)+ '...'}

Last Modified {new Date(note.lastModified).toLocaleDateString(("en-GB"),{ hour: "2-digit", minute: "2-digit", })}
))}
} export default Sidebar;
